title: Topic 001 Question 217
body: A company is attempting to manage its costs in the AWS Cloud. A SysOps administrator needs specific company-defined tags that are assigned to resources to appear on the billing report.
What should the SysOps administrator do to meet this requirement?
options: Activate the tags as AWS generated cost allocation tags.
Activate the tags as user-defined cost allocation tags.
Create a new cost category. Select the account billing dimension.
Create a new AWS Cost and Usage Report. Include the resource IDs.
